alert.note: Alert for Lee; Pontotoc; Union (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 02 at 2:56PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Union, northeastern Pontotoc and northwestern Lee Counties through 330 PM CDT... At 256 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Tupelo, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tupelo, Baldwyn, Verona, Trace State Park, Saltillo, Guntown, Blair, Sherman, Blue Springs, Endville, Branyan, Ellistown, Jug Fork, Flowerdale, Beech Springs, Belden, Alpine, Bissell, Birmingham and Chesterville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
